citation:Description.dsDescription:Text:
-Elizabeth Krise tells (in Snohomish):

  • Deer Legs
  • Slug and Wart
  • Oldtime Cooking
  • clam digging with Rover
  • Salmon Bake
  • Cooking in the old days
  • Louse in a big house

-Tape copy prepared by the University of Washington Ethnomusicology Archives 7/95.

-From 2007-101-T-106, also 2007-101-T-60 (side B) and 2007-101-T-61 (side A)
